attributes.action: Stop Mark Clattenburg from refereeing premier league matches.
attributes.background: This particular referee has a back catalogue of incorrect decisions that would make even politicians blush....his latest incorrect booking at Upton Park (red card that destroyed a good match- WHU v Palace) should be his last Premiership job.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for determining who referees at premier league matches.
